actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the State ceiling on private activity bonds.
short_title: State and Local Investment Opportunity Act of 1999

summary.text: State and Local Investment Opportunity Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the State ceiling on private activity bonds. Provides for inflation adjustment.

titles.title: State and Local Investment Opportunity Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the State ceiling on private activity bonds.
